description: Graphs the columns of a *.1D type time series file to the screen in grayscale.

install.title: Install new X11 colormap flag
install.description: Install a new X11 colormap (for X11 PseudoColor)

ignore.title: Ignore rows
ignore.description: Skip first 'nn' rows in the input file [default = 0]

flip.title: Flip axes flag
flip.description: Plot x and y axes interchanged [default: data columns plotted DOWN the screen]

ps.title: PostScript format flag
ps.description: Don't draw plot in a window; write it to stdout in PostScript format.
